meanings.sent1: Homines are intelligent creatures who walk on two legs.
meanings.sent2: Many homines live in cities and towns around the world.
meanings.sent3: The homines at the party danced joyfully all night long.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hero faced a group of homines who challenged his beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showed the daily lives of homines in different cultures.

meanings.definition: Homines (adj.): of or relating to humans
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a study on homines behavior in social settings.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider homines impact on the environment.
